content: welcome to the work opportunities stream. I have created this to allow for posting of work opportunities (either employment or contracts) - because there's plenty of companies looking for FHIR skills right now. I have subscribed you to this group if you are member of the social stream (though anyone can join or leave).
Only I or another administrator can post to this stream. If you are an organization looking for a FHIR skill set, feel free to contact me to discuss placing a notice in this stream
